title: [安全|管理|修正]Restrict Creative——一款支持MySQL.YAML的物品禁用[1.8.x-1.14.x]
author: 我觉得很淦
txt_content:
本帖最后由 白凌账号 于 2019-7-8 09:28 编辑 
                                                                                  




66007.jpg.png (5.96 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2019-7-7 10:47 上传




   Restrict CreativeWhat is this plugin able to do?/这个插件有啥鸟用？---This plugin marks the items from creative and restrict them for most of events.--这个插件可以标记物品并限制他们的大多处时间 比如放置 破坏 交互？Which commands are integrated?/这个插件包含哪些命令？--Haha nice joke, there aren`t any commands, but there are some --哈哈这是个玩笑，没有任何命令，但有一些绕过插件的命令效果图 
permissions/权限restrictcreative.bypass.drop绕过限制restrictcreative.bypass.brake绕过破坏restrictcreative.bypass.rename 绕过重命名restrictcreative.bypass.chest绕过检测configRestrictInventoryPut: trueUpdaterChecker: true[建议关掉以避免不必要的麻烦]Debug: falseBaseDataEnable: falseusername: root
host: localhost
port: 3306
database: restrictcreative
password: password
table: marks

支持-YAML
 -MySQLBUG一些mod的工作台或容器可能会绕过插件的检测更新记录4.1 
NEW
Compatibility with 1.8.x-1.14.x?
Deiutz, Yesterday at 10:53 PM 
zMatthww likes this. 4.0 
New
BaseData copatibility MySQL?
Deiutz, Jun 10, 2019 3.0 
Updated to 1.14 API version.
Works just for 1.14.x, if you want 1.13 or lower use 2.4 version of plugin ?
Deiutz, Jun 4, 2019 
Hmmcrunchy likes this. 2.4 
NEW:
Falling Blocks now will not fall.
SOLVED:
The output in chat when you place a block with the list of blocks placed.?
Deiutz, May 31, 2019 
egor123 likes this. 2.3.1 
Bug solved:
survival placed chests doesn't drop the chest itself only contents?
Deiutz, May 8, 2019 2.3 
ReAdjust
Just readjust the break blocks:
if the block is marked will be brake but will not drop any item
if the block is a: Chest ,Dropper or dispenser ,items marked from chest disappear only non-marked items will drop.?
Deiutz, May 7, 2019 
Hmmcrunchy likes this. 2.2 
READJUSTMENT
Restriction to interact with inventorys without players:
Now you can chouse if you want to restrict to put items in inventorys or not in a new file config.yml
Changed in Message.yml
From ErrorChestInteraction To ErrorInventoryPut ( You need to re edit the message.yml and remove "ErrorChestInteraction" if you want)?
Deiutz, Apr 27, 2019 2.1.1 
READJUSTMENT
Removed the "Just only 1.13.2"?
Deiutz, Apr 27, 2019 2.1 
Fixed
- The error when you can store with shift or multi-clicks.?
Deiutz, Apr 27, 2019 2.0 
NEW
Restriction to put items in chest/enderchest
Bypass permission:
restrictcreative.bypass.chest

简而言之，玩家没法放置或使用从创造模式里拿出来的东西。

replies.author: liboyang31202
replies.txt_content:
东风4B-9319 发表于 2019-7-7 11:24
和Banitem之流的传统插件有什么区别吗？
差别实际上很大，Banitem是一个禁用物品的插件，这个插件的作用是让玩家没法放置或使用从创造模式里拿出来的东西。这个插件可以防止其他管理员在创造模式刷东西给玩家。
